name: Marketplace listings page url
description:
Publicly accessible facebook marketplace listing page URL.

**Tip**: Start with this url and customize your search: https://www.facebook.com/marketplace/nyc/cars

name: #️⃣ Total number of records required
description: Leave this field empty if you want to scrape all items.

name: Start from cursor
description: Use this field if you want to resume scraping from where the scraper stopped last time. You can find this value in default storage of scraper runs under lastCursor key

name: Proxy
description: You can use proxy from your account's country if needed for extra safety.

name: Email address to receive updates
description: We will use it to commnicate important updates related to this actor, and assist you in case you face any issues
